 Hydras/Nightlight/Perceptor

 Hydras send another message to Scorponok "Keep an eye in this guy. I'm hea=

> H=
e hoped his fortelling would ease suspicions among the Predacons and Decept=
icons. After all, confessing something as such was a big gamble for any bot=
.

Scorponok's casual yet threatening stance stiffened as he listened to
Ni=
ghtshift's words. "Interesting." Scorponok said, a sly smile
spreading acro=
ss his face. "So my analysis of him came out as I
suspected." Scorponok rub=
bed his chin thoughtfully with a massive
claw.

Scorponok was about to say =
more when a call came though from Hydras . . .

> Hydras send a secret com =
link to Scorponok "What is the result so far onf the interrogation?"

While=
 not letting Nightshift hear Hydras' voice, Scorponok made no
effort his ow=
n words, "Nightshift is a spy and can switch his faction
insignia when he c=
hooses, and so have access to basic information."
Scorponok's optics never =
left Nightshift as he spoke, "and it would
seem that this access has told h=
im that Tuscon has become a Prime."

(TAG)

Preston
